title: Ticket Scan View
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has events on account with both single and multiple tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the scan view
custom_expected:
WIKI:[Scanview - Legacy](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.1TicketScanView ) (as reference)

THEN the correct Scanview is shown without swiping capability and card does not move in ticket scan, if single ticket
OR
THEN the correct Scanview is shown with swiping capability, if multiple tickets



On tap of close X, scan view slides down.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has single ticketed event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the ticket is centered without any additional tickets peeking, neither to right or left
AND swiping has no effect
AND '1 of 1' is shown below the ticket
AND baseball animation are shown on the the sides of the barcode

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has 2+ ticketed event
And user opens the scan view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 1st ticket is centered
AND '1 of X' is shown below the ticket (where X is the total amount of tickets)
AND baseball animation are shown on the the sides of the barcode
AND 2nd ticket is peeking in from right

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes the to the left to view the additional tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 2nd ticket is now centered
AND '2 of X' is shown below the ticket (where X is the total amount of tickets)
AND baseball animation are shown on the the sides of the barcode

AND the 1st ticket is peeking out from the left 
AND additional ticket is peaking out from the right, if additional ticket exists 

** for last card, no card will peek from the right, only cards will peek from left.

title: Scan View: Navigation Toolbar
custom_preconds:
[BP-10589](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10589 )

GIVEN As a user is logged in with multiple tickets for an event

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User opens the scan view of the tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following information is displayed in the scan view header:
*logo_away teamname_away at logo_home teamname_home
*Date, Time (local timezone of the event)
*Close button ('X') on the right  **note this is configurable and can be placed on the right, via client code

Example:
'T Rangers at A Athletics' 
[where 'T' represents an image of the Rangers logo (away team), where 'A' represents an image of the Athletics logo (home team)]
Tue, Sept 24 * 6:40 PM

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User swipes through their tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN scan view header information remains displayed for each ticket

title: Ticket Card - Ticket Backgrounds
custom_preconds: GIVEN the ticket scan view is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN viewing a ticket a valid backgroundVidPoster
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background should be of the home team ballpark

title: Ticket Back
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has tickets displayed in Scan View

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN tapping a tickets information button in scan view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the screen will display the "ticket back" screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN tapping Close from ticket back screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to front side of ticket in scan view

title: Embargoed Barcode
custom_preconds: GIVEN user tickets associated with the account which has ticket with embargoed barcode
custom_steps:
#QA#
sajadul.hussain@mlb.com/ MLBmlb123 have some 2023-08-26 	[22] Barcodes will be available closer to game time.

#PROD#
matthew.weber@mlb.com/ MLBmlb123 has 2023-06-24 	[22] Barcodes will be available closer to game time.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a valid embargoed ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following information is displayed in the scan view header:
On the Left:
*Away Team @ Home Team
*Date, Time (local timezone of the event)
*Venue
On the Right:
*Home team logo

AND the Barcode is NOT shown
AND messaging* is provided to customer 


*messaging potentially - 'Barcode Unavailable - Barcode will display at a later time'
AND the Sec/Row/Seat are shown

title: Add to Apple Wallet [IOS ONLY]
custom_preconds: GIVEN Apple wallet displays on IOS
custom_expected:
WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.6AddtoAppleWallet

URLs for determining if a venue allows Apple Wallet (replace ‘112’ with team ID):
http://content.mlb.com/mlb/en/config/v1/112/ballpark/boxoffice_config/web-v1.json (Prod)
http://qacontent.mlb.com/mlb/en/config/v1/137/ballpark/boxoffice_config/web-v1.json (QA)
http://betacontent.mlb.com/mlb/en/config/v1/136/ballpark/boxoffice_config/web-v1.json (Staging)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user is shown the ticket scan view
AND the option to add to apple wallet is available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN add to apple wallet button is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the add to apple wallet button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN system apple wallet prompt is displayed
AND ticket can be added to user's apple wallet

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the add to apple wallet button on another ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN system apple wallet prompt is displayed
AND another ticket can be added to user's apple wallet

custom_steps_separated.content: IF the option to add to apple wallet is not available for that venue
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Apple Wallet button is not displayed

title: Ticket Scan View - Tracking [FUTURE RELEASE]
custom_preconds:
[BP-9663](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9663):Scan View Analytics - Additional context data
**TESTING NOTES: THIS CASE REQUIRES TRACKING TO BE VERIFIED - MOST DIRECT WAY TO ACHIEVE THIS IS VIA A PROXY TOOL (.I.E. CharlesProxy)
Setup: Connect to device to Charles to monitor the content passed.

GIVEN network traffic is monitored via Charles
AND user's acct has valid tickets in BP
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for a particular ticketed event
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the scan view
custom_expected:
THEN the correct Scanview is shown 
AND the additional context are passed to analytics (for all scan view page views and actions)
*Venue ID of the event venueID
*Hometeam ID homeTeam
*gamepk or event ID of the ticket eventID
*Scan state boolean scanned

**Actions for:
*Add to Apple Wallet
*Screenshot and Screenshot Foul Ball (for more detail BP-9640)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview for ticketed event containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the scanview of the tickets are shown (WITH barcode rotating)
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified in Charles

*MLB Ballpark : Ticket Scan View 
**id.venue <num> (ex. 2 for Orioles)
**id.homeTeam <num> (ex. 110 for Orioles)
**id.event <num> (ex. 663258 for Sat, Sept 24 Astros @ Orioles)
**ticket.hasScanned <true/false>

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the ticket scanview for ticketed event containing shared secret
AND user attempts to take a screenshot of the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a device prompt is shown with:
*title: 'Foul Ball'
*description: 'Screenshots of your ticket will not be accepted for entry. Please use the app for gate access'
*'OK' as only call-to-action

AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified in Charles

*MLB Ballpark : Ticket Scan View : Screenshot Foul Ball
**id.venue <num> (ex. 2 for Orioles)
**id.homeTeam <num> (ex. 110 for Orioles)
**id.event <num> (ex. 663258 for Sat, Sept 24 Astros @ Orioles)
**ticket.hasScanned <true/false>

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user attempts to add ticket to Apple Wallet (IF the option to add to apple wallet is available)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN system apple wallet prompt is displayed
AND ticket can be added to user's apple wallet
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified in Charles

*MLB Ballpark : Ticket Scan View : Add to Apple Wallet
**id.venue <num> (ex. 2 for Orioles)
**id.homeTeam <num> (ex. 110 for Orioles)
**id.event <num> (ex. 663258 for Sat, Sept 24 Astros @ Orioles)
**ticket.hasScanned <true/false>

title: Rotating Barcode displayed when shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's acct has a valid ticket in BP 
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for particular ticketed event
custom_expected:
The rotating barcode is activated when there is a shared secret sent from PV (ProVenue) to BoxOffice and down to Ballpark. 
When there is a shared secret in the payload, the client will turn on screenshot protection and rotate the barcode.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time*

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content:
[AS ADDITIONAL VALIDATION - YOU CAN USE AN EXTERNAL APP TO VALIDATE THE PAYLOAD] 

WHEN user utilizes a Barcode Scanner application from another device* 
AND user scans the rotating barcode

*Android - 'QR & Barcode Scanner'
*iOS - 'QR Reader'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the payload of the scan is extracted
AND Time-based one-time password (TOTP) value is shown within the payload
AND Timestamp (T) value is shown within the payload

Example:
@TDC=sandbox|BCT=TI|TBN=QB82-K6UMEBER|TSC=LB129|TRW=37|TSE=9|TBT=ADULT|TPC=LB|TEV=9943|SMT=C5|TOTP=29943900|T=1648754505

title: Screenshot Detected (NOT prevented) [iOS ONLY]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's acct has a valid ticket
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for particular ticketed event
custom_expected:
*iOS cannot prevent screenshots. Taking a screenshot does not prevent it from being stored in the gallery.
*iOS can detect screenshots and will notify the fan that screenshots will not work when entering the gate.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time*

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user attempts to take a screenshot of the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a device prompt is shown with:
*title: 'Foul Ball'
*description: 'Screenshots of your ticket will not be accepted for entry. Please use the app for gate access'
*'OK' as only call-to-action

AND the device allows the screenshot of the ticket (including barcode)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps OK on the Foul Ball prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the prompt is dismissed
AND the ticket scanview is shown

title: Screenshot prevented with rotating barcode[Android ONLY]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's acct has a valid ticket
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for particular ticketed event
custom_expected:
Android notifies the fan when a screenshot is taken and prevent it from being stored in the local gallery.

Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image will be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time*

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user attempts to take a screenshot of the ticket scanview containing shared secret
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the device notifies the user 'Can't take screenshot due to security policy'

*Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image will be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

AND the image is prevented from being stored in the local gallery 

*Some Android devices may allow screenshot to be taken, but image will be completely blacked out with barcode NOT visible.

title: No Network Connection (At least one Ticket cached)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user's acct has a valid ticket
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for particular ticketed event
custom_steps:
GIVEN that I have ticket 
AND I have previously viewed one ticket
AND my mobile device is having network connection issues
WHEN each ticket is scanned at the gate (including the tickets not prev viewed)
custom_expected: THEN I should be allowed entry into the park

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN app is connected to the network
WHEN user views the ticket scanview containing shared secret for only ONE ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time* for tickets that have been configured with shared secret

*currently barcode is rotating every 5 secs.

custom_steps_separated.content:
[AS ADDITIONAL VALIDATION - YOU CAN USE AN EXTERNAL APP TO VALIDATE THE PAYLOAD]

WHEN user utilizes a Barcode Scanner application from another device*
AND user scans the rotating barcode

*Android - 'QR & Barcode Scanner'
*iOS - 'QR Reader'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the payload of the scan is extracted
AND Time-based one-time password (TOTP) value is shown within the payload
AND Timestamp (T) value is shown within the payload

Example:
@TDC=sandbox|BCT=TI|TBN=QB82-K6UMEBER|TSC=LB129|TRW=37|TSE=9|TBT=ADULT|TPC=LB|TEV=9943|SMT=C5|TOTP=29943900|T=1648754505

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the Network Access is turned off for device/app
AND user views the ticket scanview for ALL tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user can visibly witness the barcode change after configured time* for tickets that have been configured with shared secret

custom_steps_separated.content:
[AS ADDITIONAL VALIDATION - YOU CAN USE AN EXTERNAL APP TO VALIDATE THE PAYLOAD]

WHEN user utilizes a Barcode Scanner application from another device*
AND user scans the rotating barcode

*Android - 'QR & Barcode Scanner'
*iOS - 'QR Reader'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the payload of the scan is extracted
AND Time-based one-time password (TOTP) value is shown within the payload
AND Timestamp (T) value is shown within the payload
AND the values should be different than STEP 2

Example:
@TDC=sandbox|BCT=TI|TBN=QB82-K6UMEBER|TSC=LB129|TRW=37|TSE=9|TBT=ADULT|TPC=LB|TEV=9943|SMT=C5|TOTP=29943900|T=1648754505

custom_steps_separated.content:
[ADDITIONAL VALIDATION CAN BE COMPLETED BY ALFRED/SCANNER]

WHEN the Network Access is turned off for device/app
AND the tickets are scanned at the gate
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN scan should be successful
AND ticket should be noted as scanned within the scanview, indicated by a green checkmark on the ticket

title: Scan a Ticket - 2D Non-Enhanced PDF417 Barcode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The pre-conditions from [C30015118] have been satisfied
AND I have purchased or acquired a ProVenue ticket
AND The rendered barcode is a 2D Non-Enhanced PDF417 barcode
custom_expected:
THEN Alfred will decode the barcode
AND perform ticket validation

title: Scan a Ticket - 2D Non-Enhanced QRCODE Barcode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The pre-conditions from [C30015118] have been satisfied
AND I have purchased or acquired a ProVenue ticket
AND The rendered barcode is a 2D Non-Enhanced QRCODE barcode
AND if PTB is disabled on the ProVenue side….then you should see no TOTP and T encoded in the barcode
custom_expected:
THEN Alfred will decode the 13 character barcode
AND perform a ticket validation
AND if PTB is disabled on the ProVenue side….then you should see no TOTP and T encoded in the barcode
